quote: Cats do not keep the mice away; it is my belief that they preserve them for the chase.
author: Oswald Barron

quote: If a dog jumps in your lap, it is because he is fond of you; but if a cat does the same thing, it is because your lap is warmer.
author: Alfred North Whitehead

quote: Women and cats will do as they please, and men and dogs should relax and get used to the idea.
author: Robert A. Heinlein

quote: Cats are dangerous companions for writers because cat watching is a near-perfect method of writing avoidance.
author: Dan Greenburg

quote: Some men are born to cats, others have cats thrust upon them.
author: Gilbert Millstein

quote: There are two means of refuge from the miseries of life: music and cats.
author: Albert Schweitzer
